name: File Sharing Man
description: BOT Multi Force Subs File Sharing Bot berguna untuk menyimpan file dan dapat diakses melalui link khusus

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Input Bot token, Get from t.me/BotFather

OWNER.description: Enter the Telegram Username for the BOT Owner [ Don't Use @ ]

ADMINS.description: Enter User ID to get Admin rights in BOT [Use Spaces to Separate User ID ]

API_HASH.description: Get the HASH API on the web my.telegram.org

PROTECT_CONTENT.description: To prevent bot users from downloading/forwarding/screenshotting content sent to the bot [If you want to activate it, change it to True ]

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: Enter the ID of the channel or group for mandatory subscription. If you don't want to use the Fsub, fill in 0

FORCE_SUB_GROUP.description: Enter the ID of the group for mandatory subscription. If you don't want to use the Fsub, fill in 0

START_MESSAGE.description: The /start message initiates a prefix to the bot, Use parsemode format HTML
